page.title: 15The BMX Track
page.content: British Moto X means a special kind of bicycle-small wheels,strong light frame,low handlebars, special seats, thick tyres on the front and thin tyres on the rear.The bikes can perform many tricks.Special clothes are worn,bright silk tops,silk inlaid trousers,thick gloves,soft padded helmet with mouth trap. Clothes must cover all the body. Clothes are colourful with emblems,flashes and badges.A special BMX racing track has been built on the aerodrome housing estate.The track is made of cinders and grit.There are straights,various banked bends and curves and many exciting jumps. The local club is called the Folkestone Flyers.The sport caters for children and young people.Practice is held on a Thursday evening and meetings are held every other Sunday.
